Is anybody who upgraded to JeppFD 2.0 seeing enroute charts?

to Goonre, the JeppFD v 2.0 works fine (Charts, Maps, Weather, Etc.) Tested.

on DiskAid (preferences, advanced, enable: display all apps, show hidden & show root)

then navigate to JeppFD, Documnets, Data and Delete: Enroute & TermCharts. copy the ones that comes woth the torrent.

Good Luck

to Okkie79, First rule of Hacking, Never Expect a Stable o Easy Hack.

Try this: on iPad setting, Apps-JeppFD select ON to "Reset User Settings & Deactivate" the run JeppFD, press OK and continue. after that, go to Home Screen and Delete the JeppFD from your iPad. Turn Off then On the iPad.

Re-Install the JeppFD, when done (Do not Open it) copy the Enroute & TermCharts directories using DiskAid. Should Work!
